sentences.en: American blackberry with oblong black fruit.
sentences.cn: 一种结黑色长方形果实的美洲黑莓.

sentences.en: An oblong basket like bed for an infant.
sentences.cn: 婴儿睡篮一种婴儿用的长方形象篮子状的床.

sentences.en: An oblong slip of newspaper had appeared between O'Brien's fingers.
sentences.cn: 奥勃良 手指中间夹着一张剪报.
蒴果长圆形, 长约1.4厘米, 被长柔毛.

sentences.en: He looked out across the narrow oblong, noting the height of rocks on either side.
sentences.cn: 他眺望着对面一块狭长地带, 打量着两边岩石的高度.

sentences.en: It was an oblong wire cage with a handle on top for carrying it by.
sentences.cn: 那是一只椭圆形的铁笼子,上面有个把手可以提起来.

sentences.en: Leaves alternate, oblong or oblong - lanceolate, 2 - 5 cm long, 1 - 1.5 cm wide.
sentences.cn: 叶互生, 长圆形或长圆状披针形, 长 2-5 厘米, 宽 1-1.5 厘米.

sentences.en: Microscopically, there are spindle to oblong cells with hyperchromatism and pleomorphism.
sentences.cn: 显微镜下见深染多形性的梭形或椭圆形细胞.

sentences.en: Mitochondria are oblong, thread - like structures dispersed throughout the cell's cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 线粒体是分布于细胞质中的一种椭圆 、 螺旋状结构的组织.

sentences.en: Put all the plates on the oblong table.
sentences.cn: 把盘子都放到长方桌子上.

sentences.en: The knocker is oblong in shape, and of the kind our ancestors called " jaquemart ".
sentences.cn: 铁锤是长方形的, 象 古时 的钟锤.

sentences.en: They bore the oblong hardwood box into the kitchen and put it on the table.
sentences.cn: 他们把那个长方形的硬木箱抬进厨房，放到桌上。

sentences.en: What is the perimeter of this oblong.
When held to the light the small oblong leaves are seen to possess tiny perforations.
sentences.cn: 迎着光看时，就会发现椭圆形小叶子上有微小的孔眼。

trans.tran_cn: 长方形的，矩形的，椭圆形的，椭圆体的
trans.tran_en: an oblong shape has four straight sides at 90 degrees to each other, two of which are longer than the other two
An oblong is a shape which has two long sides and two short sides and in which all the angles are right angles
An oblong is a shape which has two long sides and two short sides and in which all the angles are right angles
